title: Automatic Cooling Electronic Yogurt Maker
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (5-8 Days)

 

Automatic Cooling Electronic Yogurt Maker

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

Color: White

Features:

  • Built-in cooling system automatically shifts to the perfect chilling temperature.
  • 50-ounce yogurt container allows you to make more than six 8-ounce servings of yogurt at once.
  • Easy operation starts and stops yogurt making with the touch of a button.
  • Time controls make it easy to set the recommended fermenting time according to recipe.
  • Stainless steel styling; digital time display; 120 volts. BPA free.
  • NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use.

Binding: Kitchen

Details: Electronic Yogurt Maker with Automatic Cooling The Cuisinart Electronic Yogurt Maker with Automatic Cooling turns milk and soymilk into nutritious yogurt automatically. Yogurt lovers can create an endless variety of flavors and the 1-1/2 liter batch makes enough for days of delicious meals and snacks. Operation is simple.

Once processing time has elapsed, the unit switches itself to a cooling mode. Today's health-conscious consumers want to eat right. Not only a great source of protein and calcium, yogurt also contains probiotics, or good bacteria, that are crucial for a healthy digestive system.

This Electronic Yogurt Maker takes the guesswork out of making yogurt at home. Simply mix together ingredients and pour into the yogurt container, letting the yogurt maker do the rest. You will love the ready-to-eat chilled results. Either plain or flavored, yogurt is the perfect anytime food to enjoy alone, with granola or in your morning smoothie.

Yogurt is also a great ingredient to have on hand in the kitchen for delicious and moist baked goods, as a secret ingredient to marinades for meat and poultry, and also the perfect vehicle for soups and sauces.

Product Benefits Large Capacity: Make more than six 8-ounce servings of yogurt at a time in the 50-ounce yogurt container.

Automatic Cooling Mode: The unit switches to cooling mode when the processing cycle is done, and maintains temperature until you turn the unit off.

Perfect Results - Automatically: Just add milk or soymilk, active cultures and flavors of your choice; select the time and press START and then watch the CYM-100 do all the work.

Simple Operation: Start and stop your yogurt making at the touch of a button. The LED display clearly displays and counts down processing time. The time controls make it easy to set the recommended processing time for the recipe you're using.

Stainless Steel Styling: Sleek, elegant and streamlined enough to leave right on the counter. Operation Instructions Put all of the ingredients in the yogurt container and then cover it with the yogurt container lid. Place the filled container into the housing and cover with the housing lid. Plug the unit in and the default fermentation time (8 hours) will begin flashing on the screen. To change the fermentation time (1-24 hours), use the "+" and "-" buttons. Once desired fermentation time is flashing on the LED display, press the START button. At this point, the fermentation numbers on the LED will become solid and fermentation countdown will begin.

After the fermentation is complete the unit will automatically switch into cooling mode and display "C" in the LED. As long as the unit is plugged in, it will stay in cooling mode until you turn the unit off. After 8-12 hours, the temperature of the yogurt will be between 43 and 52 degrees Fahrenheit. To turn the unit off or end the cooling cycle, press and hold the STOP button for 3 seconds. Once the unit is off, you can either remove the yogurt container and place it directly in the refrigerator, or use the yogurt scoop provided and divide yogurt into individual portions.

Tips and Hints Finished Yogurt and Taste Longer fermentation times will produce a tangier yogurt, but also aid in thickening. Strain yogurt overnight using a strainer lined with a coffee filter, for an ultra-rich and thick treat. Whole milk is recommended for making yogurt -- avoid ultra-pasteurized milk. Fuller-fat milks produce thicker yogurts.

When adding a flavor to yogurt, wait until 6 hours after the cooling process has begun. Flavors can also be added to individual portions as needed instead of to the entire batch. Certain flavors may shorten the shelf life of yogurt. Fruit mix-in flavors last longer and are better added to the entire batch, while sweeter syrups are best added to individual portions. Yogurt will be at its best and should be eaten within the first three days after completion. Yogurt can be kept for up to 8 days.

Package Dimensions: 11.5 x 11.3 x 8.7 inches
tags: Electronic Yogurt Makers, NVR

title: Automatic Self-Cleaning Indoor Pet Potty
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (5-14 Days)

 

Automatic Self-Cleaning Indoor Pet Potty (1 Roll = 27 Pads)

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • INTRODUCING SMARTPAD MODEL 2.0 WITH NEW DRIP LIP FEATURE - Just like our original machine, SmartPad 2.0 automatically wraps and seals waste to keep your home clean and odor free and prevents dog from tracking mess throughout the house. Our new version also includes new faster absorbing rolls and the drip lip to prevent any spills onto your floor.

  • AUTOMATIC ADVANCE - Select to renew pads 1, 2 or 3 times a day, or use the manual advance button for a fresh pad any time your pup needs one. Smart sensor ensures that motor will not start if dog is on the machine.

  • LONG LASTING PADS - Our premium pads are made of five layers of durable and super absorbent material. One pad roll is equivalent to 27 traditional puppy pads.

  • PERFECT FOR SMALL DOGS - Ideal for puppies that are potty training and for small dogs under 25 pounds that currently use pads. NOT FOR ADULT DOGS THAT DO NOT USE PADS.

  • CONVENIENT SIZE - Machine measures 34” x 24” x 6” and weighs 10 pounds for an easy fit in any indoor living space. Energy efficient UL-rated power supply included.

 

 

 

 

SmartPad is the world’s first self-cleaning dog potty for puppies and small dogs under 25 pounds.

The SmartPad system is a superior alternative to typical training pads which are often messy and smelly. SmartPad cleans itself and provides a comfortable place for your dog to go potty anytime. SmartPad provides freedom and flexibility when the unexpected arises and you are stuck in traffic or a meeting or social engagement runs long. SmartPad is ready when the weather is bad or the urge strikes in the middle of the night. Dogs that use SmartPad no longer have to be anxious waiting or searching for a place to go.

SmartPad rolls are strong enough to handle both #1 and #2. After your dog goes potty, waste is automatically rolled up and sealed between layers of absorbent and waterproof materials that hold in odor and moisture. The SmartPad is hands-free for days or weeks at a time. When it’s time discard a used pad roll, SmartPad makes it easy. The yucky bits remain sealed inside while the outside stays clean and dry, and you never have to come in contact with anything messy. Quick! Simple! Clean!

The SmartPad Difference



Automatic Cleaning

Self-cleaning SmartPad is the fast, easy and clean alternative to indoor doggy pads. Remove the hassle of cleaning up messes with an automatic roll that seals in waste and replaces dirty pads with clean ones. Enjoy a clean floor without the daily chore.

Odor Free

Our disposable potty pads are made with an absorbent polymer that soaks up liquids and seals in unpleasant smells. Once wrapped and sealed, waste is contained to keep your home clean and odor-free. No more worry about funky smells lingering in your home.

Sanitary Disposal

SmartPad wraps and seals in solid and liquid waste inside the roll as it automatically advances to provide a new clean pad. When the roll is finished, simply remove and replace. You never have to touch waste since the outside remains dry and your hands remain clean.

 

Weeks of Hands Free Clean

A SmartPad roll is equivalent to many traditional puppy pads, so you don’t have to worry about changing it frequently. The roll is sealed out of sight without unpleasant odors and can remain in the machine for up to a month (depending on usage) before it needs to be replaced.

 

Long Lasting and Hands Free

Improved Health and Hygiene

No more smelly, messy potty-training pads! The adjustable timer on the SmartPad control module gives you the option of selecting how often the pads advance to be replaced with clean pads, once, twice, or three times daily. The manual pad advance button also provides you with the freedom to replace pads as often as needed. Pad rolls have many pads so SmartPad is hands-free for weeks at a time. Your roll selection and advance frequency will determine how long a roll will last:

  • 4 weeks of use at 1 pad advance per day
  • 2 weeks of use at 2 pad advances per day
  • Over a week at 3 pad advances per day

Training Your Pup

It is no harder to train a puppy to use SmartPad than training for a regular pads, and transitioning adult dogs from using regular pads to using SmartPad is straightforward: put your old pad on SmartPad and gradually make it smaller. Animal behaviorists assure that most small dogs -- even nervous and easily frightened dogs -- can be trained to use SmartPad, too. Some dogs just may take longer than others. The key to successful dog training is to be patient and to reinforce positive behavior. Punishment is counter-productive, so instead, shower your dog with praise and affection. Think of the training effort to use SmartPad as a small investment that will let you and your dog enjoy a healthier, cleaner home. SmartPad includes everything you need for successful training and transitions:


 

Eco Conscious

1. Lift sensor : If the mower is lifted from ground, then it will stop working within 1 second.

3. Range function: There are four options for the ranges, user can choose the distance when the robot hits the virtual wire according the

condition of different lawns.



 
4. Bump sensor: It will activate when the mower strikes an object, fixed objects when that object is at least 6cm in vertical height from the supporting surface of the mower, when the bump sensor is activated the mower will turn back on.

 
5. Rain sensor: There Are Two Rain Sensors located on the mower, the mower will go back to the charging station automatically when it's raining.

 

6. Touch Sensor: Touch the handle when the mower is cutting ,it will cease function within 0.5 seconds.

Common Questions:

- Can high-rise glass be used?
The main use scenario of this product is the high-rise external glass, with a clean coverage rate of 99%. The safety rope can avoid the risk of falling.

- How to use the glass cleaner and more efficiently?
It is the most convenient and efficient way to wet the dishcloth with tap water and screw it to dry as much as possible, then directly cover it on the machine. If there is obvious dirt particles on the surface of the glass, you can wipe the dust off the surface with a dry cloth first, and then clean it with a wet cloth. Normally, you can clean it very well by wiping it twice. If there are stubborn stains, you can use the original cleaning tablet to mix with water and then fill it in the spray pot, then spray it on the stains and wipe it off.

- Do cleaning rings need to be removed every time they are installed?
The detachable cleaning ring is designed for the convenience of novice users. After skilled use, it can be used without detaching the direct cloth.

- How to install the cleaning ring after removal?
The clasps of the cleaning ring and the turntable at the bottom of the fuselage are all provided with prompt stickers for alignment. Press in the clasps after alignment according to the prompt stickers and observe that the cleaning disk and the bottom of the fuselage are completely horizontal from all angles, which means that they are installed in place. If the clasp is tight during the process, please rest assured to assemble. The bottom turntable assembly is made of composite materials for sealing and strength requirements, with excellent elasticity and toughness.

- Why does the machine not work when it is started up and adsorbed on the glass and the alarm "drips" appear after pressing start?
The machine has a frequency conversion function. After starting, it will twist the glass twice first to judge whether the dry humidity, friction and other conditions of the glass surface meets the working conditions. After two twists, the "drip" does not work twice, which proves that the current conditions of the glass are beyond the working range (rarely occurs). If the wet cloth is used, it is possible that the surface moisture is not dried too much, Spray water on the rag after it is dried or replaced with a dry rag; if it is too smooth, it can be replaced with a wet rag or sprayed with water.

Achieves a full charge in 12 hours. Comes with included charging base and power supply. Makes the perfect wine gift for men and women.

  • 🍷

    INCLUDES FOIL CUTTER AND WALL CHARGER - Everything you need is included to start blasting some wine bottles. Foil cutter to remove those stubborn foil wrappers and a wall charger.

title: Belgian Gourmet Brownie Morsel Chocolate Box
body_html:
Domestic Free Shipping USA [5-7 Days]


18 Count Belgian Gourmet Brownie Morsel Chocolate Box

 

We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy our 30-day money-back insurance on every purchase!


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Features:
  • Handcrafted with rich, dark Callebaut Belgian chocolate, pure creamery butter and farm fresh eggs.
  • 18 Individually wrapped pieces included in this gourmet gift. Enter your gift message at checkout.
  • Includes a sampling of 1.5" x 1.5" bite-size Magic Morsel brownies in all 6 assorted flavors.
  • The custom designed gift box features our signature purple Fairytale Brownies theme.
  • This gift is a great option to send gourmet food gift baskets. Guaranteed fresh upon arrival!

 

 

Publisher:

Fairytale Brownies

 

 

Details:

Eighteen delectable Magic Morsels are tucked in our purple enchanted gift box. It's the perfect gift for those who favor small indulgences.

With a friendship since kindergarten and a promise since high school, Fairytale Brownies was founded in 1992 by Eileen Spitalny and David Kravetz. Baking late at night in a friend's catering kitchen - with many helpers and a secret family recipe belonging to David's Mother - their dream came true. Today, every batch still begins with dark Callebaut Belgian chocolate, premium butter, farm fresh eggs, fluffy cake flour - and a dash of magic! Fairytale Brownies bakes 12 flavors of brownies in three different sizes: Original 3" x 3" brownies, snack-size 3" x 1.5" Fairytale Sprites, and bite-size 1.5" x 1.5" Magic Morsels. Six flavors each of chewy Fairytale Cookies and buttery Fairytale Bars are also crafted from the same pure ingredients.

Every brownie, cookie and bar is individually wrapped for freshness and hand-packed in custom gift packaging with your personalized message. Whether ordering for yourself or as a gift, you are assured freshness, unsurpassed taste and an unconditional guarantee. If you or your recipients are ever dissatisfied, even a little bit, we will do whatever it takes to make it right. That's our One Pure Promise.

Fairytale Brownies believes in giving back to the community and donates thousands of pounds of brownies to the Society of St. Vincent De Paul in the Phoenix area. Nationally, Fairytale Brownies supports KaBOOM!, the non-profit organization that envisions a great place to play within walking distance of every child in America. Eileen and David met on the kindergarten playground, so it's an appropriate way to give back.

Fairytale Brownies - A Taste of Pure Enchantment

title: Biodegradable Personalized Phone Case - Natural White
body_html:
We can never have enough of Nature.. so why not wear it, keep it in our pocket and make nature fashionable. 💚🌿

Environmental protection has been at the heart of our business model from day one and offering you biodegradable phone cases that serve benefits to the environment and the community is the most right thing to do. Let's create a waste-free future for a better planet TOGETHER. 🤝

While this eco-friendly and biodegradable phone case offers your phone 100% protection and no threat to our environment, making it also gives farmers an opportunity to sell flax straw rather than burning it. On the other hand, it completely reduces any possible footprint while providing a flexible and durable material to protect your precious phone.

❤️ Now you have a chance to personalize your phone case by adding your PERSONALIZED TEXT.

The engraving is made with a high-quality laser with high precision and can be personalized to your wishes. The engravement is subtle and can be quite secretive, which is perfect for having something personal to you, but not everybody sees it. It is a beautiful gift for her or him, for Valentine's Day, Birthday, Mother's day, whatever you choose. ❤️

❗ Please write your chosen personalization into the personalization box. The text must be in Latin and not exceed more than 20 characters ❗

  • The most sustainable & eco-friendly protection for your phone in the world!
  • Precise engraved personalized text
  • 100% biodegradable, compostable, plant-based, and recyclable phone case
  • Made from flax/wheat straw and PLA bioplastic, which means it can completely 100% degrade! (Made in SGS certified non-toxic production)
  • Provides excellent grip and prevents your phone from slipping out of your hand
  • Quick and easy Snap-on/Snap-off Case
  • Full phone encasing, above screen lip, and durability for maximum protection
  • Ultra-thin design with precise hole position that’s a perfect fit
  • Enclosed side buttons
  • Access to all ports, controls & sensors
  • Water-resistant for all-weather use
  • Attractive modern look and style
  • Works perfectly with WIRELESS CHARGING
  • Mag Safe Compatible
  • Made in Europe

❤ HOW TO CLEAN IT?
  1. Take your phone out of the case. Never attempt to clean your phone case with your phone inside of it. Water could get into the cracks and cause damage.
  2. It’s easy to clean a phone case using just soap and water. Mix 1 cup of warm water and a drop of dish soap in a bowl.
  3. Dip a clean, new toothbrush into the soapy water and scrub the surface of the phone case. If you don’t have a new toothbrush, use a clean cloth instead.
  4. Rinse the case off and wipe it dry with a soft cloth. Make sure all the soapy water is rinsed off the case before you dry it.
  5. Before you place it back on a phone make sure your case is totally dry.

Additional Tips and Advice:
  • For big stains, mix one-part warm water with three parts baking soda to form a paste. Apply it to the affected areas, let it sit for about 5 minutes, and then scrub.
  • Some dirt and grime may be removed with an eraser. Simply rub the eraser over the area.
  • If you want additional disinfection to use a soft cloth in rubbing alcohol. Wipe the phone case down with the alcohol-soaked cloth and after that wipe off the rubbing alcohol with a dry, soft cloth.
  • It is recommended to wipe your case down with a disinfecting wipe weekly and repeat the above following routine once a month to remove any germs and bacteria.

    WORLDWIDE
    SHIPPING

    GUARANTEE
    QUALITY
    PRIORITY
    100% SAFE
    PURCHASE

Produce Process:
Cut Glass: The craftsman should cut the big piece stained glass into thousands of small pieces and smooth all the edge of glass.

Copper Foil: The craftsman binds the small glass with copper foil, this can help the glass be welded with tin one by one.

Weld: The craftsman puts the small glass into the model according to the pattern and welds the glass with tin.

Surface Treatment: After welded, the lampshade needs to change the tin color into black with chemicals.

The lampshade size included 6 inch, 8 inch, 12 inch, 16 inch and 20 inch

title: Bunte Mini Drone Shinning LED RC drone Fliegen Ball Hubschrauber Licht Kristall Ball Induktion eders Quadcopter Flugzeug kinder spielzeug
body_html:
Produkt Beschreibung
EIN schlüssel zu öffnen, einfache bedienung, einfach zu spielen.
Unten die sensor automatische induktion hindernisse, halten fliegen nicht auf den boden fallen.
Verlassen die traditionellen handwerk eigenschaften von stille, machen fliegen mehr interessant.
Automatische power-off schutz system, lassen eltern nicht sorgen über ihre kinder sicher und glücklich.
Jede infrarot fernbedienung kann das flugzeug, drücken sie die fernbedienung schalter, starten die fliegen ball.
Mit die perfekte kombination von peal modellierung, farbe licht machen die farbe unendlichen veränderungen, mehr attraktive zu kinder.
Gebaut in Dynamische Musik. mit kühlen und flash licht, mehr kann der kinder zu gewinnen aufmerksamkeit und interesse. lassen sie die kinder spielen in die lachen.
 
Anweisungen für betrieb:
Rutsche schalter zu "Auf" position
Release die ball von ihre hand und lassen sie es fly up
Nach ca. 2-3 sekunden die propeller wird beginnen zu spin
Wenn die lichter kommen auf, halten den ball in einem gerade up position
Auf der unterseite der ball finden sie eine kleine schwarz auf/off schalter
 
Produkte Merkmale
Fliegen Ball Größe: 15*11*5,5 cm
Fliegen Ball Farbe: Transparent, Licht farbe zufällig
Ladezeit: über 15-30mins
Runing Zeit Dauerte: 6-10mins
Körper Material: ABS Kunststoff.
Geeignet für: Alter 8 +. USB Lade
Flugzeit: Ca.. 6-10 minuten.
Paket Inhalt:
1xAircraft
1xCharge kabel
HINWEIS:Nicht enthaltenOriginalBox
Wenn sie benötigen die original box, lassen sie bitte eine nachricht und ein wenig extra fracht

Made from less than one percent of all alpaca fiber, these pieces are incredibly soft, warm, and lusciously cozy. Maloca Alpaca takes great pride in offering the highest level of workmanship, quality, and service.
  • WARMER & LIGHTER: Alpaca wool is lighter and provides more warmth than traditional sheep’s wool. Unlike sheep’s wool, alpaca fiber has microscopic air pockets that make it light and breathable, yet extremely insulating, keeping your body warm and dry in any type of cool or cold climate.
  • NO LANOLIN, NO ITCH: Alpaca fibers create a very unique wool that is completely hypoallergenic. Sheep’s wool gets its itchiness and allergen from lanolin. Alpaca Fiber doesn’t contain lanolin and therefor always feel incredible on skin and never causes a reaction.
  • ETHICALLY & SUSTAINABLY SOURCED: All of our Alpaca wool is ethically sourced from small farmers. These animals live at around 14,000 feet elevation in the southern Peruvian Andes mountain range. Alpaca’s have an exceptionally low environmental impact. –The leave a portion of the grass they graze on and have soft hooves which leave relatively little environmental impact.
  • LIMITED PRODUCTION: Maloca’s collection is woven in small weaving facilities where master weavers create and hand finish our products to the highest standards. We are small family owned and operated business and stand behind the exceptional quality of everything we sell.

Details: This beautiful royal Alpaca herringbone throw is made of the highest quality, pure royal alpaca wool, conscious and sustainably sourced in Peru, and made exclusively for Maloca. Alpaca fiber is incredibly soft and cozy, warmer then wool, light and breathable, and is fully hypoallergenic. These pieces add luscious warmth to any living space or can also be used as a scarf. They also make the perfect gift for any occasion. We've put our heart and soul into these beautiful throws and are confident that you will absolutely love them. My wife and I own and operate this business from our home in the Catskill Mountains in upstate New York. I have traveled to Peru many times in the past few years to source the best quality yarns and build relationships with the good people that help us knit these special throws. We are firm believers that everything we create must be made to the highest standards and in a way that is fully conscious and sustainable. We are involved in every part of sourcing and manufacturing of these special pieces and ensure safe and healthy working conditions, fair wages, and excellent treatment of the animals that offer their wool for our use. title: Cat Finger Puppet  (white & black)
body_html:
ThumbThings Finger Puppets Are Fun To Collect, Trade, And Share With Your Friends!!

Our eco-friendly, sustainably made, Black & White Striped Cat finger puppet has been hand crafted by artisan collectives from the rural areas of the Peruvian high-plains. We source ethically, practice fair trade principles and strive to help these artisans extend their products reach. As descendants of the Incas, these artisans, mostly women, have been working with textiles for generations. Knitting is a proud tradition for the Quechua and Aymara people who still use traditional methods today. Most work from home using their passion and skills to create these colorful finger puppets which help supplement their family's income. 

Each finger puppet is as unique as the artist who created it! Some characters are only available in limited quantities and then never made again. Others are created by artisans from subsistence communities who only knit during certain periods of the year and produce small quantities of magnificent finger puppets. Our network of artisan-producers is comprised of over 800 talented individuals who are encouraged to use their creativity to the fullest! These toys are special, they are not made in a factory, they are handmade with love! 

Kids are spending more time than ever in front of screens, and child development experts, along with concerned adults, worry that electronic gadgets might substitute for important interaction. Learning through play is a vital aspect of childhood, and experts say your child should be encouraged to do so every day. Finger Puppets help promote a wide range of developmental aspects. The simple act of offering your child a few finger puppets can do wonders for their language, social-emotional, cognitive and physical development. Best of all, they aren’t just for children, ThumbThings Handmade Finger Puppets bring out the kid in all of us!

Certified by Green America, GreenP% For The Planet. Fair Trade, Handmade and Eco-Friendly! Ages 3+ 100% Nylon yarn and polyfill stuffing, all new materials. Gently hand wash, do not machine dry.

The handcrafted touch of artisan skill creates variations in color, size and design. If buying two of the same item, slight differences should be expected. Note: Color discrepancies may occur between this product and your computer screen.

  • 100% Nylon yarn with poly-fill stuffing, all new materials.
  • Recommended for Ages 3+
  • This is a handmade product.
  • Over 200 different characters to collect, trade, and share.
  • No two finger puppets are exactly alike each is unique in its own way.

Collect Them A!!!

There are over 200 adorable characters to play with, collect, trade, and share! Finger puppets excite the imagination, and inspire creativity in kids, they will will put down their electronic gadgets and spend hours interacting and playing pretend games with each other, all while learning valuable social skills!

If, like my husband, you struggle with things like the inability to settle down and fall asleep, changing time zones, travel, sleep disruption, then try these drops.
 
Unlike other CBD tinctures you may have tried that have a bitter or unpleasant taste, Sleep Drops include chamomile hydrosol and have a sweet and delicate all natural flavor.

This product is not for children and is not recommended for pregnant or breastfeeding mothers.

Sleep Drops feature CBD Oil mixed with our original blend of water-based extract of Chamomile with scentless flower essences of Motherwort, Lavender and Lemon Balm.

INCLUDING

CBD Oil 50 mg, Organic Chamomile Water Extract 0.025 ml* , Organic Flower Extract Blend 0.005 ml*, Organic Fresh Motherwort flower extract (1:6000), Organic Fresh Lemon Balm flower extract (1:6000),Organic Fresh Lavender flower extract (1:6000)
